Title: Let the rural population benefit from the abolition of school fees
Designer: PRC Finance Ministry (中华人民共和国财政部)PRC Education Ministry (中华人民共和国教育部)
Notes: In March 2005, at the opening of the annual National People's Congress, then Premier Wen Jiabao announced the abolition of primary school fees for 14 million students in the officially designated poorest counties, with the subsequent expansion to all rural students by 2007.
